Package com.project.couponProject3.controllers

Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.couponProject3.controllers.ClientController
      • com.project.couponProject3.controllers.CustomerController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("customer")
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000",
             allowedHeaders="*")
public class CustomerController
extends ClientController
    Class of customer controller for REST commands

      • purchaseCoupon

        @PostMapping("coupon/purchase")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> purchaseCoupon​(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization")
                                                                 java.lang.String token,
                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                 Coupon coupon)
                                                          throws CouponException,
                                                                 io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException
        Method of REST command, using post mapping for making a purchase of a coupon by customer. Endpoint is: coupon/purchase Receives and returns the data in JSON data structure.
        Parameters:
        token - for authorization
        coupon - the coupon instance to purchase
        Returns:
        new token and an indication message of coupon purchased
        Throws:
        CouponException - if data is incorrect
        io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException - if token is invalid

      • getCustomerCoupons

        @PostMapping("get/coupon/all")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCustomerCoupons​(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization")
                                                                     java.lang.String token)
                                                              throws io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException
        Method of REST command, using post mapping for getting all existing customer's coupons from the DB. Endpoint is: get/coupon/all Receives and returns the data in JSON data structure.
        Parameters:
        token - for authorization
        Returns:
        new token and all the customer's coupons from the DB
        Throws:
        io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException - if token is invalid

      • getCustomerCouponsByCategory

        @PostMapping("get/coupon/category/{category}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCustomerCouponsByCategory​(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization")
                                                                               java.lang.String token,
                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                               Category category)
                                                                        throws io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException
        Method of REST command, using post mapping for getting an existing customer's coupons by category from the DB. Endpoint is: get/coupon/category/{category} Receives and returns the data in JSON data structure.
        Parameters:
        token - for authorization
        category - the category of the coupons to get from DB
        Returns:
        new token and the customer's coupons requested from the DB
        Throws:
        io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException - if token is invalid
